Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController

Class OldConfigurationController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.GUIController
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.OldConfigurationController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listener, StateListener, UI
public class OldConfigurationController extends GUIController implements StateListener
A scene controller used to display all Configuration read from ClientSettings.CONFIG_FILE_PATH folder and letting user reconnect with a specific one.

    • onReconnectPress

      private void onReconnectPress(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      This method is executed when user press the reconnection button. It signals ClientController to try to reconnect the user using the specified configuration. An Alert is shown if an error occurs during this process
      Parameters:
      e - the ActionEvent of the mouse pressed

    • onNewConfigurationPressed

      private void onNewConfigurationPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      This method is executed when user press the new configuration button. It, simply, changes scene to SceneStatesEnum.NEW_CONFIGURATION_SCENE
      Parameters:
      e - the ActionEvent of the mouse clicked

    • onDeleteAll

      private void onDeleteAll(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      This method is executed when user press the "delete all" button. It deletes all configuration in configs and in ClientSettings.CONFIG_FILE_PATH
      Parameters:
      e - the ActionEvent of the mouse pressed

    • onDeleteConf

      private void onDeleteConf(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      This method is executed when user press the "delete" button. It deletes a specific configuration in configs and in ClientSettings.CONFIG_FILE_PATH
      Parameters:
      e - the ActionEvent of the mouse pressed
